basic_information.scholarship_name: Goebel Family Star Lumber Charitable Trust Endowed Business Scholarship

description: Eligibility Requirements Student must be enrolled part-time. If a dependent of a Star Lumber and Supply Co. Inc. employee, then the student must be enrolled full-time. Preference will be given to a Management Major or Sales Minor Preference will be given to a student who is an employee of or dependent of an employee with Star Lumber and Supply Co. Inc, and meets all of the qualifications. List of these eligible students to be verified by Director of HR of Star Lumber and Supply Co. Inc. Must provide a statement of financial need Preference will be given to previous recipient if they continue to meet criteria
